upright.name: Perfect Union
upright.description: When played, create a 2/2 Soulmate token with 'When The Lovers or Soulmate dies, the other gets +2/+2'

reversed.name: Broken Bond
reversed.description: When played, destroy target unit. If it was paired with another unit, destroy that one too.

body.raw:
# The Lovers

Two souls united in perfect harmony, The Lovers represent the power of choice and the strength found in union.

*"In unity, we find our truest strength."*

The Lovers represent relationships, values alignment, and choices. They create powerful synergies through paired units and positioning.
